name: EARN 2,00,000,00
body:
**### # Do you want to earn Rs.2,00,00,000 in 6 MONTHS?**

**Are you ready to work one hour daily on internet?**

**If you say YES, Then this job is for you. Read below carefully. It will take only 10 minutes. **
**You can earn thousands of rupees. Its not a joke.**

**You are going to receive Cash by Money Order Everyday**

**I will show you how to make it possible for a very small investment of 600 Rupees to earn thousands of Rupees in few days . Read further if you are interested.**

**You will see the results within 10 Days. You will be investing only 600 Rupees and I guarantee you that you will not have to spend a paisa after that.**

**This program is designed only for Indians. Please read the below mentioned content slowly and thoroughly. This will give you thousands of rupees in coming months.**

**Who can do this job?**

**- Students, Housewives, Retired Persons and those who want to earn part time income can do this job.**

**What is the business?**

**STEP 1) First you will need to send 100 Rupees Money order to the members in the admin address ( Admin 1 and Admin 2 )mentioned below. Then you need to send 100 Rupees Money order to each of the other 4 sub addresses mentioned in this website ( Total Rs.600 /- only ). **

**STEP 2) Once you send the money order to all the addresses and send us your postal address by e-mail to arokyaa@gmail.com, We will set up a website for you similar like this website.In your website your name and address will be listed in the #4 position. We remove the name and address in the #1 position and move the other three Addresses up. **

**That is #4 becomes #3, #3 becomes #2 and #2 becomes #1.**

**STEP 3) Now #4 will be blank. We place your name and address in the bottom of the list at #4. So you are in the #4 position now.**

**What will happen when you joined and placed in #4 position? **

**Once you become a member, you will be provided with all the marketing tools and software's to promote your website in the internet. If someone reads your website and if he is interested like you, they will send Money Order (MO) to you and all the addresses mentioned in your website . At this stage your address will be moved to #3 position in the new member's website and a new member will be at #4 position. Now the #4 position member will do the same kind of marketing like you do and still you get Money Order (MO) as you are in #3rd position of new member's website.**

**How Much you can Earn?**

**If you just recommend only 10 members. (A very low example) then you make Rs.1000 with your name at #4 position on the website. Now, each of the 10 persons who just sent you Rs.100 each , refers the MINIMUM 10 persons, each with your name at #3 position, and that is another Rs.1000 for you. Now those 10 each refers MINIMUM 10 persons with your name at #2 position and It will bring Rs.100000!. Now, those 10 persons turn around MINIMUM 10 persons with your name at #1 position and you will make an additional Rs.10,00,000! And all this with only 10 response. Imagine in case you refer more than 10. Sky is the limit. With an original investment of only Rs.600! AMAZING! **


**Weeks Your Position No. of members referred by you Your Earnings**
**1st week #4 10 10 X Rs.100 = Rs.1000**
**2nd week #3 10 X 10 = 100 100 X Rs.100 = Rs.10,000**
**3rd week #2 100 X 10 = 1000 1000 X Rs.100 = Rs.100,000**
**4th week #1 1000 X 10 = 10000 10000 X Rs.100 = Rs.10,00,000**
**Total Rs.11,11,000**
**The above Results may increase or decrease based on individuals effort**

**What to do next?**

**Just follow the steps below to start ...**

**Step 1. Take one white sheet and write down the Name and Address given below**

**Step 2. Please go to your nearest post office and make 6 money orders of 100 rupees each to all the 6 members mentioned below. That is 100 rupees each to the 2 Admins and 100 rupees each to all the 4 members mentioned under the sub-addresses list. That will be total of just 600 Rupees.**

**Step 3. When fill up the Money order form, Please write your Name, Email Address (Write your email address clearly, NO RUNNING LETTERS) , and your phone number clearly in the space provided for communication.**

**Step 4. Send an Email to arokyaa@gmail.com with the subject " Add me in #4 Position" with the following details.**


**Write your Name.Your Postal address and your telephone number.**
**Please be careful in writing your Postal address. Because for this address only you will receive money orders.**

**Step 5. Once we confirm your payment details, We will send an Email which contains all the instructions on how to start the business. **




**What we do once you make payment to all the 6 members ?**

**We will create a website similar to the one you are reading. This website contains your address at #4 position. You will also get and Internet marketing tips and ideas. You  too advertise your website. . We will send all the information's by email.**

**What I will get for this Rs.600?**

**You will get 60MB of various E-books about Internet marketing and Internet earnings. You can download all the products after became member of this website. You will get all this products with full master resale rights. You can sale this products with your own price keep all profits with you. Apart from this you will get referral marketing business. If you refer someone for this business you will get income by Money Order.**

**Below are the 6 addresses ( 2 Admins + 4 Sub addresses ) where you need to send Money Order (MO) for 100 rupees each**
 **ADMIN 1 :**
**S.MANJULA**
**NO.6/99,MASQUE STREET,**
**ARAKKONAM,TAMILNADU,**
**PINCODE-631001**
 **ADMIN 2 :**

**V.SELVARAJAN**
**NO.6/99,MASQUE STREET,**
**ARAKKONAM,TAMILNADU,**
**PINCODE-631001**
